  • Link: https://www.pressherald.com/2020/04/30/biw-fails-to-get-5-5-billion-10-ship-contract-to-build-navy-frigates/

    BIW fails to get $5.5 billion contract to build Navy frigates Link: https://www.pressherald.com/2020/04/30/biw-fails-to-get-5-5-billion-10-ship-contract-to-build-navy-frigates/

    BIW was one of four shipyards vying for the contract, alongside Austal USA of Alabama and Huntington Ingalls of Mississippi, but Fincantieri was chosen, which will build its frigate at its Marinette Marine shipyard in Wisconsin.

    Wisconsin shipyard beats out BIW, 2 other bidders for Navy frigate contract Link: https://www.pressherald.com/2020/04/30/wisconsin-shipyard-beats-out-biw-2-other-companies-for-contract-to-build-navy-frigates/

    The $795 million contract calls for Fincantieri Marinette Marine to design and build the lead ship, with options for as many as 9 more. BIW was one of 3 other finalists.
